message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I'm still not sure if I can stretch to $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
